laboratory_examinations.findings: Hematocrit of 22% due to iron-deficiency anemia; later declined to as low as 28% when iron supplementation was not consistent.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially reported at 22%, then reliant on iron; declined to 28% after inconsistent iron supplementation.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Uterus size measured at 11.9 cm x 13.2 cm x 5.5 cm with multiple fibroids, fundal fibroid of 5.2 cm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Uterus previously measured at 14 cm x 11 cm; size decreased after myomectomy, but fibroids returned.
